Tokisaki:CastleThatEatTime.NAME: 蚀时之城
Tokisaki:CastleThatEatTime.FLAVOR: 是补充影子（时间）的最佳手段。
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时， 增加 1层 阴影 .

Tokisaki:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

Tokisaki:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
Tokisaki:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

Tokisaki:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

Tokisaki:ProperMeal.NAME: 正餐
Tokisaki:ProperMeal.FLAVOR: 谢绝没有教养的用餐礼仪。
DESCRIPTIONS: 敌人因 侵蚀 而死，额外获得 #b5 最大生命 。

Tokisaki:CatToy.NAME: 毛线球
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时，得到  1 只  猫 。

Tokisaki:CastleThatBingeTime.NAME: 暴食城堡
Tokisaki:CastleThatBingeTime.FLAVOR: 吃影子的话，人也能吃一个吧？
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合结束，恢复  影子 层数的体力（最多3）。
